price: «Çünkü sen onları bırakırsan kullarını saptırırlar; yalnız ahlâksız, nankör (insanlar) doğururlar (yetiştirirler).»
arabic: إِنَّكَ إِن تَذَرۡهُمۡ يُضِلُّواْ عِبَادَكَ وَلَا يَلِدُوٓاْ إِلَّا فَاجِرٗا كَفَّارٗا

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: innaka in tadharhum yuḍillū ʿibādaka walā yalidū illā fājiran kaffāran
